title: Add Author Section to README.md
description: Update the project's README.md file to include an 'Author' section with the creator's name and a link to their GitHub profile.
details: Open the README.md file in the root of the repository. Add a new section titled '## Author' (or '## Credits') after the project description or at the end of the file. In this section, write 'RafiulM' and provide a Markdown-formatted link to https://github.com/RafiulM. Ensure the formatting matches the rest of the README and follows Markdown best practices. Save the file and prepare it for commit.
test_strategy: Preview the README.md file in a Markdown viewer or on GitHub to ensure the new section renders correctly and the link is functional. Visually verify placement and formatting. No automated tests are required.
